sentences.en: Double-stack trains are taking a lot of freight that used to be routed via trucks.
sentences.cn: 以往由卡车运送的很多货物现在都改用双层列车运送了。

sentences.en: Environmental pressures are strengthening the case for waterborne freight.
sentences.cn: 环境的压力使人们更加认可水上运输。

sentences.en: Every word the professor said was freight ed with meaning.
sentences.cn: 教授的每一句话都是意味深长的.

sentences.en: Freight - car loadings continue to slack off.
sentences.cn: 火车货运的 运输量 继续减少.

sentences.en: Freight Train 36 has been shunted on to Track 6.
Freight trains travel slowly on upgrades into the hills.
On the customs declaration, the sender labeled the freight as agricultural machinery.
sentences.cn: 在报关单上，寄货人将货物列为农用机械。

sentences.en: The freight is included in the account.
The gifts to him would have filled a railroad freight car.
sentences.cn: 他的生日礼物足以装满一节火车车厢.

sentences.en: The goal of shifting freight from road to rail has been quietly abandoned.
sentences.cn: 已经悄悄放弃了将货物从公路改走铁路运输的目标。

sentences.en: The railways will carry a far higher proportion of freight traffic.
sentences.cn: 铁路将承担比例高得多的货运量。

sentences.en: There is ten yuan in the bill for freight.
This aircraft company deals with freight only; it has no travel service.
sentences.cn: 这家航空公司只经营货运业务, 不经营客运业务.

sentences.en: to send goods by air freight
Tons of freight were flown into this airport every day.
sentences.cn: 每天有许多吨货物被空运到这个机场.

sentences.en: We’ll send your personal belongings by air freight and your furniture by sea freight .
sentences.cn: 你的个人物品我们将以空运方式运送，家具将以海运方式运送。

sentences.en: We’ll send your personal belongings by air freight and your furniture by sea freight.
sentences.cn: 你的个人物品我们将以空运方式运送，家具将以海运方式运送。

phrases.tran_cn: 运费到付（到目的地后付运费）
运费由提货人支付，运费到付
货运代理；货物发运；运费由提货方支付

trans.tran_cn: 货运，货物，运费，船运货物，货运列车
trans.tran_en: goods that are carried by ship, train, or aircraft, and the system of moving these goods
to send goods by air, sea, or train
to send goods by air, sea, or train
